banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: A solution for building a generation of inventors
videoData.socialTitle: A solution for building a generation of inventors

nodes.whoTheyAre: Joachim Horn transformed the complicated process of creating smart devices and products by empowering everyone to become an instant innovator. A mechanical engineering graduate and co-founder of the Imperial College Design Collective, Horn fused his passion for design and tech to develop SAM Labs. SAM, dubbed the “Lego of the Internet generation,” is the world’s most engaging Internet of Things toolset, giving users tools to become inventors.

videoData.description: What if building intelligent systems and innovations was as easy as drawing connections on a computer screen? Joachim Horn has made this possible. SAM Labs' K-12 STEM, STEAM and learn to code courses put the brainpower and experience of engineers in the hands of anyone. SAM Labs enables students with imagination to go from idea to prototype almost instantly, combining hands-on and virtual learning with 200+ hours of standards aligned lessons - so teachers and students can focus on the learning experience.
